Implemented Security Controls.No Access Control: No modifiers restrict who can call makeOldFucks, leaving the function open to any caller.

Unchecked Low-Level Call.Description: The contract uses low-level calls without checking the return value, making it vulnerable to failures that could propagate unexpected behavior.

Loop Execution Risk.Description: Excessive looping in makeOldFucks with a high `number` parameter could lead to high gas costs or out-of-gas errors.
